ratings.rComments: Mark Wolters is hands down the BEST professor at UIUC. I really wish he could teach all of my classes. The man explains everything so well and his lectures are very entertaining. He adds entertaining lecture videos for his tests and makes his tests like the study guides. Hands down best professor at UIUC. They are very luck to have him.

Such a great professor! The slides and his video lectures really make studying easy, as long as you go to the lectures (for attendance checks, you can only miss so many checks) and review slides you're fine! He's so animated during lectures, it was never boring for me. He's very passionate about what he does and he really cares about his students.

Best professor I have had! Gives attendance checks, but lectures are fun and he sometimes hands out food. He really cares about his students. I learned a lot because Wolters presented the info in an interesting way. Has tons of study aids (videos, slides, etc.). Would love to take a class with him again. He is a super smart, nice guy. Great class!

Wolters is one of the best professors at U of I. You learn a lot and the class is easy. Look over the slides the night before and you're golden. Attendance is mandatory because he gives attendance checks.

Best professor I've had so far!! Very helpful, funny and SUPER PASSIONATE(enough to motivate you to be a better student/person). You should go to the lectures because of the pop attendance checks but his lectures are entertaining most of the time with real life examples.

I learned a good deal in this class and enjoyed it too. There's a lot to know for the 3 exams, but it's definitely manageable. He always makes himself available in the BIF the day before an exam as well as email and Twitter. He's a very agreeable, good professor!

One of the best professors at UIUC! Really cares about the students and teaches in a way that we can relate to. I didn't mind attending lecture because he made things interesting. Would highly recommend Wolters, he is a great professor and great guy.

BADM 320 was very easy because Wolters is such a great teacher. I had it at 8am and he did attendance checks, but if he doesn't do attendance checks for you then don't go because this is one of the easiest business classes at uiuc. do the quizzes, study the night before for the exams, and you will get an easy A
Probably one of the my favorite professors I have had on campus! Definitely take his class. I have used the basic marketing concepts learned in other classes, and it's an easy A!
Cool guy

Wolters was ok. He talked a lot. His lectures were all over the place and he got kinda crazy about attendance. He was always calling people out for leaving class early. Attendance was mandatory. He took it about 15 times in the semester. The course material was pretty clear cut. I got an A., but I could have gotten an A without going to class.
He is a great professor and really tries to get kids interested, but its so easy i dont have to pay attention.
He really cares about all the students. Always give out helpful commons after presentations.
Easily the best professor at UIUC! He is great and really cares about his students. Wants you to learn and enjoy the course. Definitely need to have him at least once
BEST PROFESSOR EVER! But seriously, he's extremely entertaining and actually cares that his students take away something from his class.

Mark Wolters is the coolest professor you could ask for! He relates everything you learn in class to real world examples which makes the class easier to comprehend and just more interesting in general. The tests are straightforward, and he has plenty of extra videos to help you study, but still go to class! Best professor at U of I
Took marketing with him while traveling around Europe. It was a really cool and hands on learning experience and I got to learn a ton about international marketing.
Best professor at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
By far the best professor at UofI that I've ever had, it's a shame I don't get to take more classes with him because of my major, pick his class regardless of whether it's an 8am or not
Best Prof. ever!
Awesome professor. I'd pick future classes with him as soon as that chance presents itself
Mark is hands down one of the best professors I had. Not only did he make class very fair he is just a nice human being. His class wasn't just a blow off class either...I actually learned a lot.

While the material isn't always thrilling, Wolters is an entertaining professor who will make sure you know your stuff before your done. Take this class with Wolters, it's better than taking it online.

Taking 320 with a teacher other than Wolters is a mistake.  Attendance checks were 5%, 3 tests 90% (no final), and a syllabus quiz (5%).  There is also extra credit.  Going to class was fun because he makes it exciting.  Studying the power points thoroughly is enough to get A's on all tests.
Great teacher, funny and easy going. Defiantly take this lass with him!
Awesome teacher and even greater guy. Realizes he is at this university to promote the academic and professional growth of his students. I definitely recommend this course.

Im a Business junior her at UIUC from Korea. Professor Wolters is not just funny, but also very lively and straight explaining his materials. He is an alumnus here and cares earnestly about his students. Attedance is not required, but not boring and very helpful (EC opportunities+ wink hints). If you have to take BADM 320 at UIUC, take his class!
super entertaining! makes class fun & makes it really easy to study for exams with his helpful videos. loved him so much I'm taking another class of his!

Wolters is one of the best professors I've had yet. He's entertaining, super helpful, and doesn't make the class difficult. I got an A without the textbook because he helps out with videos and study guides online.
Great teacher!
Best and easiest teacher at U of I. Would highly recommend him to anyone

Mark is an awesome dude. He really knows his stuff and gives great examples. He makes the class almost too easy unfortunately. I would have learned more if there were more assignments or something. All you really need to do is study the day before exams that's it. A lot of attendance checks but only 5 are counted.
awesome professor!Funny and grabs your attention
He rocks! Makes class fun and interesting. TAKE BADM WITH HIM!!!!
Best professor I have ever had by far.  If you want to study abroad, he is your go-to guy!
Easy, Easy class.  Only grades are the 3 exams, syllabus quiz, and attendance.  For attendance he randomly takes it 8 times throughout the semester and you only need 5/8 to get 100% on attendance.
Great teacher. Fairly easy class
Quality Teacher. Awesome Guy.
Amazing professor, his teaching can be related to everyday life and is very helpful. His websites and videos are very entertaining and knowledgeable. He is by far the best professor at the U of I .
Great, easy
He is an absolutely amazing teacher. He is very interesting and will not bored you at all. If you can take a class with him DO IT! Fun class and learned some relevant knowledge for my field.
He is my favorite teacher. The class was awesome.
Awesome teacher and awesome class! I actually enjoyed attending and tests were very straight forward!

He is the man. You only have to show up to a handled up of class to fulfill the participation portion. There is also a ton of extra credit. Cares a lot and make the lectures enjoyable when you go to them
Mark Wolters is the best professor I've ever had at the U of I. He is really passionate of what he's doing. I highly recommend taking this class.
Wolters is the man. Highly recommend.
best professor ever! If his lecture is 8 in the morning, i will still highly recommend you to choose that section!! that's the professor's charm!!
This guy is the man. period.

Mark is one of the best professors I have had at UIUC! He cares more about making sure his students know about the REAL world of marketing and can actually get a job than test scores and homework grades. Totally useful class and he is always full of energy. Loved this class.

I'm a marketing major, and this class only verified that I chose the right major! Mark truly sets us up to succeed in the classroom and makes the material easy to remember and to relate to for future reference! :)
Great guy, easy class. That's all you have to know

Love Mark Wolters! Took him for the second time this semester, and I'm happy I did. He makes class enjoyable with all the material that must be covered. He truly cares about his students, and he lets it be known. I feel sorry for anyone who doesn't take him. If you're spending 30 grand on your education taking his classes makes it well worth

Will give you skills and insights necessary in today's work environment. Understands the main goal of college is a career and will prepare you for exactly that.  Great professor! rGeat lecturer! Very passionate!
Wolters is a champ.  Lectures are very entertaining and exams are easy.  Also a bunch of extra credit.
BEST PROFESSOR EVER!
He made the class interesting and i enjoyed going

Can't ask for a better professor.  Actually wants you to be better prepared  for life after school.  Really helps everyone on their presentation skills.  Class is not very difficult but Mark makes you want to attend every day.

The best professors at U of I.  You will not find another professor who cares more about their students and wants them to do well.  He will do anything to make you succeed and cares about all his students.  Makes class easy so if you have the chance to take a class with him you should!

Favorite professor at U of I! He genuinely cares about his students, is passionate about teaching, and knows how to keep students engaged. He also gives students the grade they want/deserve if they meet expectations.
Hilarious!

I had to take this class bc I am an adv major and I ended up really enjoying it. Mark is a great teacher and makes the content interesting to learn. He uses a lot of examples which help equating what we learned to real life. His videos are SUPER helpful for preparing for an exam and it really helps out people like me who are more visual learners.

Professor Wolters is one of my favorite professors on this campus. All slides available via compass, all tests based on those slides and the accompanying videos, and overall the class is interesting, engaging, and an easy A. Highly recommend it!
First time I've ever written one of these. Quite simply, you are at a loss if you don't take Wolters.  Not difficult, extremely captivating, and still learned more than most other business classes.
Great professor!

Great guy, does some self promotion in class for his own things which gets annoying. In general he is very knowledgeable and a great guy. If you have a chance to take a class with him I would strongly recommend it.
Wolters spends a lot of time out of the classroom recording summary videos. He only wants his students to succeed! The exams are completely fair and if you study you will do very well.

The average grade in his class ended up being an A. He was very engaging and an interesting. Also, all of the information on the test could be found in his videos/powerpoints online meaning if you missed a class or a few it wasn't detrimental to your grade.
Favorite Prof in U of I!
Awesome teacher!
Watch the videos and read the lecture slides and you will do very well! Wolters is super nice and funny and very easy to understand

Mark accommodates this business core class for everyone. His classes are fun and entertaining, and he's honestly there if you want to know more about marketing (or more). He honestly cares about the subject and his students. The exams are pretty straight forward - just review the powerpoints and watch his videos. You should get an A!

One of the best teachers I have had at U of I. Very interesting guy, he makes the class so easy to understand and you'll want to go to class to hear about all of his amazing experiences from around the world!
Super cool guy. Doesn't want to give you a bad great. There are attendance quizzes once a week, but going to class is the only work that you have to do besides studying for tests
great professor who's passionate when it comes to teaching but reasonable when it comes to grading.

Mark Wolters is a great professor. He is passionate about what he teaches and also very knowledgable. He particularly wants his students to really learn his material, so he goes above and beyond to make sure that every learning style is accommodated.

Great class! I hope he teaches BADM 320 for years to come! He doesn't make you do annoying McGraw-Hill online homework. There are only 3 exams, but you will be well prepared for them as he provides videos that will help you for the exam. WATCH THE VIDEOS - a lot of questions come from the videos verbatim.

One of the best professors out there! He can makes it really entertaining to come to class although the material can be a little dry sometimes. He tries his best to make sure that everyone understands by making videos that can be found on youtube.  Hes very fair on tests, straightforward questions, not tricky. Overall good guy. Totally recommend!

Amazing professor! He is so passionate about teaching and the subject, it is hard not to respect the guy! I definitely recommend taking this class with him! He is so helpful and makes great videos to help for studying! He is also funny which makes class more enjoyable!

Mark is the best professor.  His lectures are so much fun and he is very knowledgeable. You can tell that he loves what he does and he is more than happy to help if you have a question.  Make sure you take this class with him! Or any other class that he teaches for that matter.
Pretty cool. He makes sarcastic jokes. Sometimes funny.
Mark is an awesome Professor! I'm really happy that I had classes with me! Really knowledgable guy full of real life examples! Top Notch!

He has the perfect combination of knowledge, energy, dynamics and personality. He has the differentiation factor! Unforgettable classes! I was extremely lucky to have him as a professor at Nova School of Business and Economics, in Lisbon, Portugal.
Even having to explain some "not-really interesting" things, we also did well. Also, really good, individual tips after presentations; never saw something like this...
Really fun... but, which is the most important, really good explanations and good teacher. Going to his classes really makes sense, and you never get bored
This professor is Awesome!! He makes things so clear with perfect examples and this together wihth the energy that he brings to class; AMAZING!

The best professor I ever had. Enthusiastic in sharing his knowledge and experience, and genuinely interested in the students. A wonderful person, funny,inspiring and a great educator. The only thing I could point out as area of improvement would be to give more feedback on students work - how can we improve, why a certain grade,etc.

Favorite professor at UIUC. He's passionate about teaching and very knowledgeable about sales, marketing and business. Classes are entertaining and very informative. He's very approachable and cares about his students. I highly recommend taking any class he teaches. If you do your best you should get an A and you'll learn a lot along the way.

(Random module in Nova University) I just thought that the course/teacher did not had much value. A lot of common sense presented in a clever way, but still nothing that made a big difference (for me at least). To be fair it was always entertaining though.
Mark is not only a competent professional but also a friend for his students. If your taking a 8am class his energy  will definitely wake you up. 5 stars
one of the best professors I had
Interested in the students, very direct and clear, funny and easy to talk to. 5*
Very helpful. Very enthusiastic. Nice guy. Knowledgeable. Class is fun and we learn a lot about the real world. Good combination of theory and practical.
Makes class fun and exciting to come to.  Awesome teacher! Take this class!
